name: Dragon Perception
description: Dragon Perception - 2.5D platformer, in which you will need to play for a small dragon, on whose lands attacked aggressive robots.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
